## ZeroConfig type

Configuration for zero-cache change source.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ZeroConfig = {
    auth: {
        token: string;
    };
    kv: {
        provider: 'zqlite';
        zqlite: {
            file: string;
        };
    };
    tableMapping?: {
        [clientName: string]: TableMapping;
    };
};
```
**References:** [TableMapping](./zero-contracts.tablemapping.md)
